shortContent: The character gains additional +10 when ganging up.  If both allies have it, then they both get +20.
content:
The character has experience of fighting in paired teams that
work together to take down their enemies. When ganging up
on an opponent, the character gains an additional +10 bonus
to Weapon Skill Tests. If both characters who outnumber the
enemy have this Talent, both gain an additional +10 bonus,
for a total of +20. This bonus is in addition to the normal
bonus gained from outnumbering opponents.
